text: Yoshi's New Island is a platform video game for the Nintendo 3DS game console. It is a part of the Yoshi series. It is the third game in the Yoshi's Island series. It is the sequel to Yoshi's Island DS. It was released on March 14, 2014. The gameplay of Yoshi's New Island is similar to the previous two games in the Yoshi's Island series. The player moves Yoshi through many stages. Yoshi has to get through the stages by not getting hit by enemies or losing the baby he is holding. ==References== Category:2014 video games Category:Yoshi games Category:Nintendo 3DS eShop games Category:Nintendo 3DS games Category:Nintendo Network games Category:Side-scrolling platform games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games about children Category:Video games about time travel Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Yoshi's New Island
